title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: The display property of an item is not being properly applied when set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item is still displayed.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item should be hidden and not displayed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'.
4. Check if the label is still visible in the new PDF emitter.
